title: Create Opportunities, Don't Wait for Them
itunes:title: Create Opportunities, Don't Wait for Them
description:
Episode 150 - If you want new opportunities you have to create them by getting out, networking and working for them. Most people wait around and hope they will get a new idea or an opportunity will come there way but that is not how it works. In this episode I dive into this topic and talk about the best ways to make new opportunities.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
